properties.PopupInfo:
Royster Company

Money Point Pratt St
Chesapeake VA 23324

EPA ID#: VAD003178126

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ENTIRE FACILITY

Institutional Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA772GC - Governmental Control

Based on the sampling results under RCRA Closure of the SWMUs Nos. 1 and 2 and the more recent facility soil sampling, the VDEQ and the USEPA agree that Corrective Action is Complete at the facility provided that future use of the property will be restricted to industrial use and/or wetlands revitalization. The facility will be required to file a notice with the Recorder of Deeds in the City of Chesapeake to prohibit residential use of the property as the institutional control measure to meet the Corrective Action is Complete with Controls Determination.

If residential use for this property is proposed in the future, the site soils would have to be rescreened and reevaluated to demonstrate acceptable levels of constituents of concern for unrestricted residential uses.
